mapper.insert:
insert into ent_menu (id, menu_name, url, sequence, icon, menu_type, parent_id, parent_name, create_time, status, auth_status, desensitize_status, sys_code, remark, company_code, sys_menu_code) VALUES
(#{detail.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detail.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.menuType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{detail.parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.parentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{detail.status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{detail.authStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{detail.desensitizeStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{detail.sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{detail.companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.sysMenuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id from ent_menu where company_code = #{companyCode}
mapper.update: update ent_menu set status = 0 where company_code = #{companyCode}
mapper.select: select url,company_code from ent_menu where status = 1 and url is not NULL and url!=''
mapper.update: delete from ent_menu where sys_code in(select t.sys_code sysCode from ent_module t where t.sys_module_code = #{sysModuleCode})
delete from ent_menu where sys_code = #{sysCode} and sys_menu_code not in(select c.sys_menu_code from sys_module_detail c where c.sys_code = #{sysModuleCode})

update ent_menu
menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_name = #{parentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
auth_status = #{authStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
desensitize_status = #{desensitizeStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where sys_menu_code = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
